        public int checkWin()
        The method check if someone win
        Returns:

      • movePiece

        public boolean movePiece(int xOr,
                         int yOr,
                         int xDest,
                         int yDest,
                         boolean colorPlayer,
                         boolean empty)
        This method move a Piece if the moove is available and return true if the moove has been done
        Parameters:
        xOr - Piece's X origin Coordonate
        yOr - Piece's Y origin Coordonate
        xDest - Piece's X destination Coordonate
        yDest - Piece's Y destination Coordonate
        colorPlayer - Player's color
        empty - true if the player want to empty the current Piece
        Returns:
        true if the moove has been done
